name: f25-cm-tracker-rsr
description: This is a single‑file web app to track FIFA/EA FC‑25 Career Mode data. It includes an Importer + Dashboard to visualize player performance, a Transfers panel with budget helpers, and a premium Weather widget (Open‑Meteo) for upcoming fixtures. Entries are stored in your browser (localStorage) and the dashboard reads from a robust, deduplicated store so you can log matches quickly and review form over time.
